panels.description: Weekly APY updated once per day, takes the now time and updates it against the lp prices a week ago.
panels.title: st-yETH APY

panels.description:
Boost is how much yETH is staked into st-yETH custom amm. If more yETH goes to lp in the curve yETH-eth pool then less % is staked in st-yETH causing the boost to increase. 
If pool_supply < total_assets boost > 100%
panels.title: st-yETH APY vs % Staked in st-yETH
Total Supply of st-yETH in the AMM pool

panels.description: Amount of ETH in the st-yETH amm for $lst.
panels.title: $lst virtual balance
Virtual balance vs rate in the st-yETH AMM pool
